users.bio: Ho preso spunto dal grande fratello ciao!
Amante della scritture, dei romanzi e della filosofia
Sono una scrittrice che ama le sue opere
Sono uno scrittore di diversi generi

stories.plot: A critique of totalitarian society and mind control.

stories.title: The Name of the Rose
stories.plot: A historical novel with elements of mystery and medieval philosophy.

stories.title: Pride and Prejudice
stories.plot: A story of love and social criticism in 19th-century England.

stories.title: The Little Prince
stories.plot: A philosophical and poetic tale about life and friendship.

stories.title: Moby Dick
stories.plot: The story of the obsessive white whale hunt.

stories.title: The Lord Of The Rings
stories.plot: An epic fantasy adventure to save the Middle Earth.
